TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeInfo extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Wrapper class that represents attributes on a type at design time. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This class is used to represent attributes on design-time types (types that are yet to be compiled). This occurs only when validation is triggered through the designer.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection that contains values for each of the arguments associated with this instance.
Docs.value: A collection that contains values for each of the arguments associated with this instance.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance can be created.
Docs.value:
Returns a value which is if either of the following conditions are true:
- The <xref:System.Type> defining this attribute has an <xref:System.Type.Assembly%2A> which is a null reference (Visual Basic ).
- Any one of the objects in the array <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AttributeInfo.ArgumentValues%2A> is of <xref:System.Type><xref:System.Exception>
Otherwise the value returned is .

Docs.param: The index of the requested argument in the collection of arguments.
Docs.summary: Gets the argument for this instance, based on type and index.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> cast to the requested type.
Docs.exception: is out of range of the argument collection.
is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
